channel.title: What are your plans?
channel.description:
This is about studying. Basicly, I wanted to make a thread to know what you guys are studying.
This is mine:
My English sucks so bare with me.
I'm in 4th grade in highscool studying marketing and economics. The next 2 upcoming highschool years I'm going to study programming managament in the same highschool.
After that I'll be 19 and I'll start my bachelor at Digital Arts And Entertainment. There will be 2 options,
[b]Major Game Development and Major 3D Arts,[/b]
[u]Major 3D Arts[/u] has very little programming and is mainly high poly advanced animation and modeling for commercials, games, movies,...
[u]Major Game Development[/u] is mainly programming: you learn advanced C++, SQL, and some other languages. You also get modeling and animation but far less than Major 3D Arts, you basicly learn to make game ready models and stuff. You learn every single thing about 3D and you learn to make your own 3D applications from scratch and you learn to work with the PS3, XBOX360,... well when I'll be doing this there will be probably a PS4 and and XBOX720 and the NGP and some more.
Oh yeah, I'm going for Major Game Development. After I finish that, I will be 21 years old.
Then, I'm not done yet, I'm going for a master diploma, but that turns into an universitair diploma in 2013. So, I will study 2 more years to get that in Electronics-ICT. They will basicly turn me into a hardware/software IT-engineer.
I will be 24 years old when I will fully complete all of this. It will take me 7 years to accomplish this and I will.
[size=5][b]So, what are your plans or what are you currently doing?[/b][/size]

item.title: What are your plans?
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“SETO, post:22, topic:394895”]why do all your future looks so boring and fake?[/quote]Who are you reffering to?

P.S. Nice job on the engeneering.

Read full topic

item.title: What are your plans?
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

why do all your future looks so boring and fake?
I’m in Electrical and Computer Engineering, so finishing a double degree just 2 more years.
In EE side i am specializing in CONTROL, COMMUNICATIONS & SIGNAL PROCESSING and ANALOG & DIGITAL ELECTRONICS, and in CE side i am specializing in basically software.

Currently working as a summer research student under a prof @ my university. mostly studying on spectrography and thermodynamic properties of nanoparticles, and imaging them using Atomic Force Microscope (AFM), Kelvin probe force microscope (KPM) and Electrostatic force microscope (EFM).


I got this image off the internet, i can’t show you the images i done, since i am restricted from taking anything out of the lab, including my notes. its just to show you what i image. this is obv a AFM

Read full topic

item.title: What are your plans?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Probably going to play out like this: Attend the Naval Academy(already accepted). Pursue Aviation. Graduate. Backpack Euorpe. Serve 5-10 years in the Navy.
I’ll be studying law/government through this time so that when I’m done serving I can do straight to work.

Read full topic

item.title: What are your plans?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Im writing a book (about 160 pages in right now), coding a website with a friend (rant), visiting clients with my father for our family organization, taking long visits to the hospital for my stomach, and drinking myself till I forget about my life in my free time. What a life.

Edit: Just relized this is for studying topics, im studying behavioral analysis classes online since I can do as much as I want or as little. I have done about 2 years of schooling in under 1 year so far. My dream job is a agent in the FBI behavioral analysis unit (yes yes, I know criminal minds, but I wanted to be one before I ever heard of the show.)

Read full topic

item.title: What are your plans?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“kongmeng, post:18, topic:394895”]i think u should make the chat room cooler and to talk easyer.
also where is the web client[/quote]What the fuck??

OT: My plans are to go to a college in the U.S or the U.K and learn Computer Engineering. But b4 I go to college I’ll take a 1 year break. After that I’ll work in my dad’s company till I find a job somewhere decent.

Read full topic

item.title: What are your plans?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Mack n cheese, post:14, topic:394895”][quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=492085.msg3598489#msg3598489 date=1305342872]

[quote author=Mack n cheese link=topic=492085.msg3598419#msg3598419 date=1305338809]
i’m taking over my dad’s palm tree business. he makes on average 150,000 a year. been slower the last few years, though.

EDIT: 150 seems a little high.

probably about 100,000
[/quote]There’s demand for palm trees? o.O
[/quote]i said it’s slow right now >.>[/quote]Define slow (we love trolls<3)

OT: I actually graduated with my Masters in Education in the winter. Back where I was in the first place…at home…on my ass…with a bucket of KFC in front of me. Just aren’t any good jobs out there at the moment. -/

Read full topic

item.title: What are your plans?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:12, topic:394895”][quote author=Mack n cheese link=topic=492085.msg3598419#msg3598419 date=1305338809]
i’m taking over my dad’s palm tree business. he makes on average 150,000 a year. been slower the last few years, though.

EDIT: 150 seems a little high.

probably about 100,000
[/quote]There’s demand for palm trees? o.O[/quote]Exactly what I was thinking.

BUTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT OT - Funny you should ask this question today! I actually spent around 7 hours getting signed up to start college in Fall, via a program we have here called Running Start. Basically you can get high school credit and college credit for just a college class, so you can get your HS Diploma and credits toward a degree at the same time. It has high prerequisites though, so it’s hard to get into. Basically I’ll have an AA Degree at the same time I get a High School diploma! I then plan to transfer over to University of Washington, and get a higher degree in computer software/science, which should only be 2-4 years. Then I plan to get a job!

Read full topic

item.title: What are your plans?
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:6, topic:394895”]Nothing! I lucked out big.

The best part of the job is that you are very independent, and it’s different every day. You are home dispatched, meaning you wake up in the morning and check your work orders on the internet, then go do them. You don’t deal with any bosses, and then come home when it’s all finished. You get paid for a full day if you finish early, but don’t get paid extra if you stay late.

I was given a work truck to keep at home, a laptop, and a blackberry. Lovin it[/quote]That seems really awesome, I mean really awesome, especially the independent part.

Me however, I’ll probably work for a company for like a year, get some money together. AND THEN open my own company doing game development, hardware, software,… I’m not sure what exact. But that’s my dream, owning a big company.

Read full topic

item.title: What are your plans?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Nothing! I lucked out big.

The best part of the job is that you are very independent, and it’s different every day. You are home dispatched, meaning you wake up in the morning and check your work orders on the internet, then go do them. You don’t deal with any bosses, and then come home when it’s all finished. You get paid for a full day if you finish early, but don’t get paid extra if you stay late.

I was given a work truck to keep at home, a laptop, and a blackberry. Lovin it

Read full topic

item.title: What are your plans?
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:4, topic:394895”]I’m a service technician for my ISP. Started training last week, but today was my first real work day. However I still have another 4 weeks of training. The starting pay isn’t much but it’s good. I will be making much more later on.

By service tech, I don’t mean a phone-bitch. I install and repair phone lines/dsl/fibre optics(where available) for business’s and residential. Also maintain all of the lines/infrastructure through-out the city.[/quote]Damn, that seems fun to do, what did you study for that?

Read full topic

item.title: What are your plans?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I’m a service technician for my ISP. Started training last week, but today was my first real work day. However I still have another 4 weeks of training. The starting pay isn’t much but it’s good. I will be making much more later on.

By service tech, I don’t mean a call-center-bitch. I install and repair phone lines/dsl/fibre optics(where available) for business’s and residential. Also maintain all of the lines/infrastructure through-out the city.

Read full topic
